newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Vantive Corp still a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Vantive Corp still a buy.

text.p: -- Robertson Stephens & Co analyst Eric Upin reiterated his buy rating on shares of Vantive Corp, saying investors overreacted to management's outlook on the company's revenue growth and expenses.
-- "We believe the fundamentals of the Vantive business and the market opportunity for (its) Customer Interaction Software remain completely intact," Upin said in a statement.

-- Late last week, Vantive told analysts in a conference call that revenues in the fourth quarter and first quarter of next year would show little change from the third quarter. The stock dropped from the low 40s afterwards.
-- Upin said the stock was now trading at a discount to its competitors. He estimated the company would earn $0.47 a share in 1997 and $0.66 in 1998.
-- In Nasdaq trading Wednesday, the shares rose 2-3/4 to 31 by 1400 EDT/1700 GMT.
-- Last week, Vantive said its third-quarter earnings rose to $0.12 a share from $0.03.
